directions: Mash avocados in a small bowl. Mix in lime juice, ancho chile powder, and salt, leaving chunks if desired. Stir in peach, red onion, jalapeno, and cilantro. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 large fresh peach - peeled, pitted, and diced
½ small jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced
title: Peach Guacamole | Allrecipes
